title: The Art Of Choosing: The Decisions We Make Everyday of our Lives, What They Say About Us and How We Can Improve Them
description: Pub 2010-4-1 329 Little Brown UK Every day we make choices Coke or Pepsi Save or spendStay or go Whether mundane or life-altering. these choices defineus and shape our lives Sheena Iyengar asks the difficult questionsabout how and why we Is the desire for choice innate orbound by culture Why do we sometimes choose against our bestinterests How much control do we really have over what we chooseHer award-winning research reveals that the answers are surprisingand profound In. our world of shifting political and culturalforces. technological revolution. and interconnected commerce. ourdecisions have far-reaching consequences. Use this book as yourcompanion and guide for the many challenges ahead. No one asksbetter questions. or comes up with more intriguing answers MalcolmGladwell. author of THE TIPPING POINT
author: Sheena Lyengar
